Interface IResultsComponentBindings

The bindings, or environment in which each component inside the ResultList exists.

Index

Properties

  • componentOptionsModel
  • componentStateModel
  • queryController
  • queryStateModel
  • root
  • searchInterface

Properties

Optional componentOptionsModel

componentOptionsModel: ComponentOptionsModel

Inherited from IComponentBindings.componentOptionsModel

  • Defined in src/ui/Base/ComponentBindings.ts :38

Contains the state of options for differents component. Mainly used by ResultLink

Optional componentStateModel

componentStateModel: ComponentStateModel

Inherited from IComponentBindings.componentStateModel

  • Defined in src/ui/Base/ComponentBindings.ts :22

Contains the state of different component (enabled vs disabled). Allows to get/set values. Trigger component state event when modified. Each component can listen to those events.

Optional queryController

queryController: QueryController

Inherited from IComponentBindings.queryController

  • Defined in src/ui/Base/ComponentBindings.ts :26

Contains the singleton that allows to trigger queries.

Optional queryStateModel

queryStateModel: QueryStateModel

Inherited from IComponentBindings.queryStateModel

  • Defined in src/ui/Base/ComponentBindings.ts :18

Contains the state of the query. Allows to get/set values. Trigger state event when modified. Each component can listen to those events.

Optional root

root: HTMLElement

Inherited from IComponentBindings.root

  • Defined in src/ui/Base/ComponentBindings.ts :14

The root HTMLElement of the SearchInterface in which the component exists.

Optional searchInterface

searchInterface: SearchInterface

Inherited from IComponentBindings.searchInterface

  • Defined in src/ui/Base/ComponentBindings.ts :30

A reference to the root of every component, the SearchInterface

Optional usageAnalytics

usageAnalytics: IAnalyticsClient

Inherited from IComponentBindings.usageAnalytics

  • Defined in src/ui/Base/ComponentBindings.ts :34

A reference to the Analytics.client.
